Contact.contactMeDescription:
Interested in learning more about my work or discussing potential opportunities?
I welcome inquiries from recruiters and companies.
Please feel free to reach out using the contact information.
Contact.emailFailed: Failed to send your message, please try later
Contact.messageSent:
Your message has been sent!
I will respond to you as soon as possible at the email address provided: {email}
Contact.name: Name
Contact.placeholderMessage: Hi, i would like to know if you're interested to work on our product. Are you available to talk about it ?

seo.description: You're looking for a Lead Tech React.js / Node.js to develop your application ? I'm here to help you. Discover my work on my portfolio and contact me.
seo.title: Adrien Guesnel - Freelance Lead Tech React.js / Node.js
